Class IRLFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.omg.CORBA.FT.GenericFactoryOperations, org.omg.CORBA.portable.InvokeHandler, IRLFactoryOperations, org.omg.CORBA.FT.PullMonitorableOperations
public class IRLFactoryImpl
extends IRLFactoryPOA

A class implementing the factory for the IRL components.

See the IRL idl documentation.

IRLFactoryImpl

public IRLFactoryImpl(org.omg.CORBA.ORB _orb,
                      org.omg.PortableServer.POA _ogPoa,
                      org.omg.CosNaming.NamingContextExt _nc,
                      java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String _FTD,
                      java.lang.String _IRLFStart,
                      java.lang.String _LFDStart,
                      java.lang.String _file_properties,
                      java.lang.String _udp_port)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Constructs an IRLFactory for the host.
Parameters:
_orb - The orb.
_ogPoa - The POA of the factory.
_nc - The Naming Service.
id - The id of the factory.
_FTD - The name of the FT doamin.
_IRLFStart - The property to run the IRLFactory.
_LFDStart - The property to run the LocalFailureDetector.
_file_properties - The path to the configuration file.
_port - The port for TCP connections.
_udp_port - The port for UDP connections.
See Also:
LocalFailureDetectorImpl
